topics.body:
"@Kaz":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559ff78663687263ee000367#post_559ff78663687263ee000367
It might be different for different people, but I've heard one person describe it as that jolt you get when you've just slipped and you're beginning to fall, except you're stuck like that for a long time and there's often no telling when it'll happen

Any of this apply to you?

topics.author: 5446fcfc6368723ec21a0000

topics.body:
Shit's going to go down with me and my mom soon. I can feel it.
I tried to buy something (which I couldn't buy anyways because it was sold out), and now she's going to take my card away. That probably would've been the end of it, but then she just started demanding respect from me after I started arguing with her to not take it away.

Thank the fucking Lord my dad is on my side. He called me and explained the situation of why I can't buy it a different way (not being that it was $200, but that I have nowhere to put a minifridge in my room) and he said he's noticed my mom getting very snippy too.
